page.title: 02 Best Day Of My Holidays
page.content: On Tuesday morning I woke up,got washed and dressed then went through the kitchen for a cup of coffee.We decided to go to St Andrews for a run. My brother sat in the back of the car playing with his cars.We drove along the coast road and passing through Kingsbarns my dad said it had won an award for being the cleanest village in Scotland.When we arrived in St Andrews we had a walk round the ruins of the castle and the cathedral,and had a look at the infamous "Bottle Dungeon".After dinner(I had steak pie and chips)we returned to Leven where I played the amusements and had three turns on the Waltzers.Too soon it was time to go home and change for Donna's birthday party.It was a disco and I had a great time.
